actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to establish a Commission on South Korean Influence in Congressional Affairs.

summary.text: Establishes in the House of Representatives the Commission on South Korean Influence in Congressional Affairs. States that it is the function of such Commission to make a complete investigation of all attempts by the South Korean Government or it's representatives to illegitimately influence, present and former Members of Congress, through bribery or other means. Requires the Commission to report its findings and recommendations to the House no later than one year after all the members of the Commission take office.

titles.title: Resolution to establish a Commission on South Korean Influence in Congressional Affairs.
